titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8316

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, 6 March 1862.

Hon:
Nat Gaither Jr
Sec: of State_

Please note the following upon your record-
Capt: Zachariah S. Taylor is dead- (Com. dated 16 Novr 1861). 1st Lieut: John R. Jamison & 2d Lieut: Wm Prewitt are promoted- (Coms: dated 18 Novr 1861). 2d Lieut: Tho. D. Dudley Jr has resigned (Com: dated 28 Feb 1862)
1st Lieut: John Roberts is promoted (date of Com: 8 Oct 1861)
2d Lieut: Wm B. Skaggs is promoted (date of Com: 8 Oct 1861)
2d Lieut: George W. Roberts is promoted (date of Com: 8 Octo. 1861)
Benjamin F. Wayne Qr Master promoted to Brigade Qr Mas: (date of Com: 8 Oct 1861)

Elisha Simpson Capt. is dead- (date of Com: 9 Novr 1861)-
2d Lieut: John W. Vanderpool is dead- (date of Com: 16 Nov 1861-)

I send Comms: for record- in twelve viz:
1862 Feb 22- James L. Bruch Capt -- #1
17- John Roberts Capt -- #2
25- John G. Evans Capt: -- #3
27- John R. Jamison Capt: -- #4
Jan 18- Wm B. Skaggs- 1st Lieut #5
Feb 17- Wm R. Buford- 1st Lieut #6
27- Wm Prewitt- 1st Lieut #7
"- Holman F. Hardy 2d Lieut #8
23- Christo T. Grinstead 2d Lieut #9
8_ John Travis 2d Lieut -- #10
28- Dudley M. Craig 2d Lieut #11
16_ Geo. W. Roberts Qr Mas: #12

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
